amendment.description: To provide for consumer education on insurance and other financial services for members of the Armed Forces and their spouses.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2460 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2460 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Clinton. (consideration: CR S12497-12513; text: CR S12508-12509) To provide for consumer education on insurance and other financial services for members of the Armed Forces and their spouses.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2460 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2460 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Clinton.
